name: Limbo Gumbo (GGJ2022)
description:
Welcome to Limbo Gumbo! Each soul orders a hellish or heavenly dish. Add your ingredients to match the meter on the bottom of the pot! Some souls have specific requests, so remember what you've added to your gumbo! Some souls appreciate complex flavors. If you need to clear your ingredients, pull the lever to dump your gumbo. Remember, no one likes cold gumbo!

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/limbo-gumbo-8
